song.title: 21 September
song.info: There isn't really much to say about "21 September". I wanted to do something different from the norm and to remove some dust from one of my hardware synths. So, basically, i did an atmospheric electro-minimal track; most of the sounds come out from the Virus C synth and it was sequenced in Ableton Live; about 2 afternoons of work. Hope you like it!
